Professional Summary

Ideal role for me is one that puts the team in a position with clients where we can collaborate and whiteboard solutions to overcome their technical problems, designing and bringing to market solutions involving cloud platforms, storage, and GPU-accelerated workloads.

Professional Experience

Nutanix — Solution Architect (2021–2024)

  • Developed multiple territories (AZ, NV, WA, OR, ID, AK) through expert architecture of multi-cloud management, DR, and BC solutions.
  • Guided clients in optimizing GPU-accelerated workloads using NVIDIA AI Enterprise and DGX Cloud.
  • Transitioned a fast-growing city to modernized modular infrastructure, avoiding 3–5× renewal fees from prior cloud vendors.
  • Helped universities modernize database workloads and reduce licensing costs across hybrid multi-clouds.
  • Enabled universities to manage cloud transformations, budgets, and protection from ransomware via automation and orchestration software.

Buurst — Cloud Storage Solution Architect (2020–2021)

  • Architected cloud storage strategies for Fortune 500 clients and GTM cross-functional teams globally.
  • Deployed edge data sites for Oil & Gas clients across the Pacific and Indian Oceans.
  • Built scalable storage solution for Indian company supporting 80k concurrent video exam users.
  • Collaborated with Product Management for SoftNAS and Edge products to enable cloud data migrations and high-performance tiered storage.

Continuous Technology — Solution Architect Manager (2016–2019)

  • Led pre-sales design and post-sales implementation for enterprise clients.
  • Reduced technology and communications budgets by 25%.
  • Drove adoption of Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud services.

TD Synnex (Signature Technology Group) — Solution Architect Director (2012–2016)

  • Delivered demos, proposals, and POCs for enterprise cloud migrations.
  • Reduced operational costs by up to 90% through cloud infrastructure adoption.

Xtreme Consulting (Microsoft V-Dash) — Partner Technology Specialist (2008–2012)

  • Designed and delivered AWS & Azure cloud data/storage solutions.
  • Member of Microsoft Virtual Technology Solutions Partner (V-TSP) team.

Intel Corporation — Systems Engineer (1997–2007)

  • Led cross-functional teams delivering automation tools, increasing adoption by 20%.
  • Saved $500K in production costs via factory automation reliability improvements.
  • Received Intel’s Enterprise Software Technology Award for excellence in product validation and solution implementation.
